# QR Code Reader

A simple Python package for reading QR codes from input and managing a queue.

## Installation

```bash
pip install qr_code_reader
```
# QR Code Reader

A simple Python package for reading QR codes from input and managing a queue.

## Installation

```bash
pip install qr_code_reader
```
## USAGE
```bash
 qr_reader = QRCodeReader(queue.Queue())
 codebarre = qr_reader.Read()
```
